phrases: All four of you are going to hell.
Nii-san's the only one that stands a chance anymore!
Kageyama-kun, use all of your powers!
I cannot let them all die.
I have no choice but to fight with all I have got.
When things go south, it is okay to run away!
I cannot believe this is happening.
I have a bad feeling about this...
A tremendous amount of stress is going to hit Nii-san.
Honestly, I do not want to hurt anyone.
But if I do not, we are going to be killed.
That is the feeling I got.
I realized that I have to do it in order to protect everyone.
That is the kind of situation we are in right now.
that it was okay to run away.
Do not scare me like that!
I thought you actually cut me for a sec.
So that katana was a fake after all.
So what kind of trick did you use to cut the floor earlier?
He is acting like he usually does.
Then... I will just chop off your head next!
Real adults do not have time
That is Kageyama-kun's master for you, I guess.
I did not mean to rip your costume!
Is Reigen-san actually the real deal?
Is this like the newest form of 3D imagery or something?
What were you even trying to do?
Is this man some kind of monster?
Are you telling me someone this skilled still exists in this world?
We cannot have him getting in the way of our world domination.
You were using some kind of magic trick, too, huh?
Just try that thing with the black orbs again.
Is he going to be okay?
Leave this to the adult here.
My body seems to be in great shape today.
It is okay to run away.
As soon as he heard those words,
the explosive amount of energy building up within Mob
There are times when the power of one's words is unfathomable.
That responsibility had made Mob's bridge collapse.
One's heart can find a resolution just by being offered a helping hand.
As a result, all of Mob's energy was temporarily tossed over to Reigen.
In essence, he had successfully run away
and was feeling rather refreshed now.
All that was left in his heart
My Black Orbs swallow up and destroy anything they touch...
And this man is touching them with his bare hands...
What happened to the man that was trying to run away just a moment ago?
Looks like I will have to put my body on the line, too.
No matter how powerful an esper you are,
I cannot call you an excellent esper.
Because you have no desire for domination.
The reason you are so powerful and yet so unknown
is because you are living while hiding your powers, right?
I am filled with ambition, and I want to go higher and higher,
Stop talking while you are still on top of me.
The reason my Black Orbs burst earlier was because
the energy they were trying to take in was way over their limit!
Also, when you are speaking to someone,
Actually, what is with this strength?
That is the only plausible explanation.
Seriously, someone your age needs to quit messing around.
Do not try and lecture me when you have only seen its good side!
As soon as I was born, I was abandoned by my parents.
I got to experience none of that as a boy.
I was terribly bullied at an orphanage, and I cursed the world!
If I had not, I would not have survived!
And then I awakened to my powers...
I was able to survive because of these powers!
Anyone who rejects my way of living can
Do not look at me like that!
I totally understand how you feel.
H-He is the same as me?
When I was in grade school, maybe it was around fourth grade...
I forgot to tell my parents that it was sports day at school that day,
so I was the only one with nothing to eat.
What are you even talking about?
A story about when I felt lonely as a boy.
Do not compare that stupid story to mine!
It is the ultimate weapon of destruction.
If all else fails, I will put you to sleep with this cursed cologne!
I do not really get it, but do not point that at others.
Are you still doing that crap?
You use the psychic powers you have been blessed with for the stupidest things.
You are like a little kid with a knife.
Who do you think you are?!
What is that thing on your forehead?
It has nothing to do with you.
Then what is with these things that look like shoulder pads?
Those are to guard my shoulders...
Which means they are just accessories and have no purpose, right?
Do not get the wrong idea.
No matter what kind of special powers they may be blessed with,
You guys have not realized that yet!
You are so addicted to your special powers, you have developed tunnel vision.
You are plotting world domination when you have not even seen the world?
No one's going to follow you like that!
First, get rid of those childish shoulder pads and grow up!
You just want to escape from society, right?
If you want to make it big, you have to live in reality!
You are telling us to return to being commoners?
Do not look at this lightly!
You still do not get it, do you?!
Who the hell do you think you are?!
You are nothing more than a commoner!
You are just a part of the masses!
I am much more powerful than you, and I am still just a commoner...
So what does that make you?!
He dragged them out of their delusions and back into reality by force...
I thought that maybe he was a girl, but...
That is what you said, is not it?
We are superior lifeforms to the rest of humanity!
I am sure you have to believe that to even go on.
But sadly, society has no interest in you.
No group made according to your stupid yardstick is big enough for me!
Quit relying on those around you, old man.
You are making me sad here.
I was born with these powers, so what is wrong with me showing them off?
What is wrong with changing the world?!
To me, you are all no different from monkeys!
Even though I am so special!
I am so amazing, so why will not you just acknowledge that?
The world should put me on a pedestal and worship me!
That is the only world that is worthy!
No, having psychic powers does not make you popular at all.
And that is all there is to it.
I am going to erase you all...
Erase this whole building and start over!
Looks like I am out of gas.
You just do not know when to give up.
It is not an actual black hole.
If it is made from psychic powers,
I can always find a way to deal with it.
The Seventh Division will be dissolved.
I was to inspect the place and take anyone who seemed useful back to HQ...
Sadly, there was not anyone worth my time.
The evil spirits have been whittled down to one...
The poison jar has been completed!
Matsuo, there is nothing left for us to do.
Come out, my ultimate evil spirit, Marshmallow-chan!
I was finally able to get out.
Now that I have regained some of my strength,
I can help out a hundredfold!
You mean the climax happened without me?
Why are you able to see me when I am not in my visible mode?
I have come to a realization.
Those guys just might be able to stop it...
She is as cute as ever today.
You are staring way too much.
Staring at girls is all well and good,
but today's the day that you are going to talk to me, Mob-kun.
No, I have got club again today.
I will wait until you are done.
But I have got my job after that.
When are you going to tell me everything?
Your older brother came by last night.
You must have been through a lot, too.
We both went a little crazy.
I am about to go apologize to Onigawara-kun and the others.
The entire student body's going to hate you.
That is my own fault for doing something so stupid.
And... now my brother is on my side,
so I will keep in line.
So it was you guys who planted the recorders on me.
That was a crappy thing to do.
And I knew anyway, so it is not like it matters now.
People did not care whether I was actually the culprit or not.
They were chomping at the bit for a stick to beat me with, a chance to kick me out.
That is where the problem was.
I realized that I was hated by everyone around me,
and how weak my heart was.
Your brother was worried about you.
He thought I was going to kick your ass since I was so pissed off,
but I will let things slide since you are the shadow leader's younger brother.
The hell do you think you are talking to?!
I am still going to grow, just like White T Poison.
He looks like he is about to pass out.
to me, Nii-san is stronger than anyone else.
But he is passed out on the ground.
By the way, President, did you give up on finding telepaths?
Actually, I have not even started yet.
Right now, it is like a wild-goose chase, so I am trying to get some actual leads.
You guys should at least try to help me out.
I tried searching on the Internet but could not find any.
Of course you are not going to find them that easily!
Why did you bring us here again?
I guess you have not given up on psychic powers.
Actually, I was not the one who brought you here today.
It was at the behest of someone else.
So you guys must be the research subjects here.
Oh, it is another hot guy.
but it will definitely be worth nurturing them.
He is Hanazawa-kun, one of the guys who fought that organization that day.
Do you guys want to get stronger with me?
Since one of their divisions was crushed,
I am sure Claw will make a move soon.
It will be for self-defense and so you can fight back when that happens.
Kageyama took all the glory that night.
I am only here because Shigeo asked me to come.
He passed out from anemia and cannot help with exorcising spirits.
Actually, do you even need Shigeo anymore?
You awakened to psychic powers, did not you?
The only thing I gained from it is the ability to see you now.
So you are just a plain old con artist again.
You are a rather rude spirit.
Why do I have to help you?
That is why he had you come over, is not it?
If he was just calling out, a phone call would have sufficed.
Who do you guys think I am?
Are not you Mob's errand boy?
I am a high-level evil spirit!
Did I make some kind of mistake?
I told you to fix that habit of yours.
Let him bend all the spoons he wants.
Oh, I would dropped my phone.
Espers from outside infiltrated the place and slaughtered the upper echelon.
The division leader, Ishiguro-san, was no big deal either.
As for all of the underlings,
the enemy totally won them over.
Sho, what are you talking about?
I am asking you for a status report on the inspection.
The organization you are so proud of is not the best in the world at all.
Quit messing around and come back to Japan already, you stupid father.
Making me do an annoying inspection like that...
At least I got that off my chest.
We have received numerous reports of tsuchinoko sightings throughout Seasoning City.
City Hall, in a bid to reinvigorate the area, has put a bounty on the tsuchinoko
and is requesting help in capturing it.
and wear clothes you can exercise in and do not mind getting dirty.
Mob and Reigen A Giant Tsuchinoko Appears
We are going to capture a tsuchinoko.
This is the kind of place where those suckers show up.
Have you ever seen a tsuchinoko, Master?
Do not you have any passion when it comes to UMAs?
I hear there is a bounty on its head.
I do not think amateurs are supposed to go this deep into the mountains.
Mob, we might be amateurs when it comes to hiking,
I knew this place was the jackpot!
After all that talk about passion,
he is already distracted by the matsutake.
Whatever it is, apparently it is starving!
We are going to exorcise it, Mob!
Actually, Master, is not that the UMA?
It shrank so much after you exorcised it.
Er, actually, it just threw up a lot.
What the hell was that thing to begin with?
I am going to grill up some matsutake at the office.
Guess we should buy some kabosu, too.
